nodes.text: In the year 3 ABY, several members of the Rebel Alliance set up an ambush on an uninhabited planetoid. They sent out a distress signal that was picked up by four Imperial TIE fighters on a far reconnaissance patrol, and when the TIEs arrived, they were promptly destroyed, and their lone survivor was interrogated. Four Rebels then used his recognition codes to enter his secret armada, which was passing near the planetoid, in stolen TIEs of their own.
